origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FleetManagementAPI.get_financial_strategies', 'description': 'This function provides financial strategies for managing a fleet based on fleet size and operating costs.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'fleetSize', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of vehicles in the fleet.'}, {'name': 'operatingCost', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The total operating cost of the fleet per month.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'financialStrategies', 'description': 'Strategies to optimize financial management of the fleet.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FleetManagementAPI.get_financial_strategies, 它的参数输入如下: 'fleetSize'是'50', 'operatingCost'是'100000'.
